title: Vermicelli pasta with prawns and basil
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1/2 (500g) packet vermicelli pasta', '1 teaspoon chopped garlic', '500g large prawns - peeled and deveined', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes, drained', '125ml dry white wine', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
